category-def.name: org.unicase.modelgenerator
category-def.label: ModelGenerator_Base
category-def.description: This category includes the basic ModelGenerator-features, that is the ModelGenerator itself and the ModelChanger. These feature allow to generate and change Ecore models reflectively.

category-def.name: org.unicase.unicase.modelgenerator
category-def.label: UnicaseModelGenerator_Adapter
category-def.description: This category includes the Unicase ModelGenerator-feature, that allows to generate instances of the Unicase Ecore model from the Unicase Navigator's context menu.

category-def.name: org.unicase.ecp.modelgenerator
category-def.label: ECPModelGenerator_Adapter
category-def.description: This category includes the ECP ModelGenerator-feature, that allows to generate instances of any Ecore model from the Unicase Navigator's context menu.
